did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.physdesc: Correspondence, notes, professional papers, and subject files.
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Correspondence, notes, professional papers, and subject files relating to Stifel's work in economics and agriculture, with particular reference to Africa, Nigeria, Thailand, and the Philippines.

bioghist.head: BIOGRAPHICAL NOTE
bioghist.p: Development economist. Secretary of the Rockefeller Foundation, 1974-1984; Director-General of the International Institute for Tropical Development in Ibadan, Nigeria, 1985-1990; Visiting Professor in Cornell University Southeast Asia Program and the Cornell International Institute for Food, Agriculture, and Development, 1991-1995.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Correspondence, notes, professional papers, and subject files relating to Stifel's work in economics and agriculture, with particular reference to Africa, Nigeria, Thailand, and the Philippines.

controlaccess.head: Names:
controlaccess.corpname: Cornell University. Institute for Food, Agriculture, and Development.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Laurence D. Stifel papers, #14-27-2993. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.

did.unittitle: Africa: Demography (Population and other Related Matters)
Agriculture: (Taskforce on Research Innovations for Productivity and Sustainability)
Burma and Thailand: Contrast in Development Patterns (in long folder)
CGIAR: Global and National Research System
Nigeria: Forestry (Forestry III Project by World Bank) 1
Nigeria: Forestry (Forestry III Project by World Bank) 2
Philippines: ICLARM (Search Committee for Director General)
Philippines: IIRR (Deed of Land Donation) (in a long folder)
Southeast Asia: Agricultural Research and Extension
Southeast Asia: Business Environment in SEA
